title: Readiness Blocker
description: Machine-readable codes for issues preventing measurement readiness

enumDescriptions.insufficient_history: Not enough historical data for the methodology
enumDescriptions.insufficient_spend: Spend volume too low for reliable measurement
enumDescriptions.insufficient_geos: Not enough geographic regions for geo experiments
enumDescriptions.insufficient_conversions: Conversion volume too low for reliable modeling
enumDescriptions.data_not_connected: Exposure data transport not yet configured or delivering
enumDescriptions.model_training: Model is currently training on ingested data
